dlgPart.npc_text:
It’s hard to believe that this haggard man with sunken cheeks and hollowed eyes was once a powerful loremaster of House Crassus.
His eyes roll around aimlessly until they settle on Meru. “My Lord,” croaks the old man, attempting to get up but Meru stops him.

“I sent another faithful to the Oracle, yet <he/she> too returned empty-handed,” says Meru.
“An oracle is upon the lips of the Lord, and his mouth will not err in judgment,” replies the old man without hesitation.

dlgAnsw.text: “I saw the ghostly machines but I couldn’t touch them.”

dlgPart.npc_text:
“That’s easy! Render to Lord the things that are Lord's and to, uh, ghosts the things that are ghosts’,” announces the old man, looking at you triumphantly.
“The hand, you dolt! You need the Ghost Hand to touch things that are out of this world.”

“Then your eyes failed you!” shouts the old man. “It’s there! I told you it’s there!
“If your eye fails you, pluck it out! It’s better for you to see the Lord with one eye than to have two eyes and remain blind!”

dlgAnsw.text: “How can I see better with one eye than with two?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “If your eye is God-blessed, it will see,” says the old man with dead certainty.

dlgAnsw.text: “How can I acquire such a blessing?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “You can’t,” cackles the old man. “You need an eye that was already blessed.”

“Ha! Where would <he/she> find it? They are gone! Destroyed by the harbingers of Evil! Melted and poured away to cast the world into darkness!
“But!” exclaims the old man, raising a shaking finger and aiming it at you, “it is your destiny, so keep searching! It’s there, I know it. I can feel it, calling to me, hiding from me!
“Stay off the beaten path and you shall find it. Crawl with the worms, soar with the eagles! I have faith in you, my <boy/girl>!”
“He was a great man once,” Meru says with great sadness. “His faith wasn’t strong enough and his mind couldn’t handle it.”

dlgAnsw.text: “Do you know what he was talking about?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “I’m not sure he knows that himself,” says Meru, “but if this Blessed Eye exists and can be found, the library of Saross would be a good place to start.”

dlgAnsw.text: “Any other place you can think of?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “I’m not sure he knows that himself,” says Meru, “but if this Ghost Hand exists and can be found, the library of Saross would be a good place to start.”

dlgAnsw.text: “Any other place you can think of?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “The faithful have been scouring the ruins for any signs of Al-Akia but found nothing so far. They did find a strange undergound chamber in the hills to the south. I sent a few men there but they haven’t returned yet.”
